/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import PC_LogoHeader_Home from "./img/PC_LogoHeader_Home.png"; import Cart_Button_main from "./img/Cart_Button_main.png"; const Header = () => { const [scrolled, setScrolled] = useState(false); const handleScroll = () => { const offset = window.scrollY; if (offset > 189) { setScrolled(true); } else { setScrolled(false); } }; useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); }); let navbarClasses = ["navbar"]; if (scrolled) { navbarClasses.push("scrolled"); } else { navbarClasses.pop("scrolled"); } return ( <> Plankcooking
About Shop Reviews Recipes Contact
{/* The above is for large view */}
  • About
  • Shop

  • Contact
); }; export default Header;
